pulltitle: Update package.json
pullsbody: Adding a few missing properties so the package.json file passes the validator at http://package-json-validator.com/ and doesnt give warnings during `npm install`.
pull_commit_message:
Update package.json

Adding a few missing properties so the package.json file passes the validator at http://package-json-validator.com/ and doesnt give warnings during `npm install`.

pulltitle: Only listen locally by default
pullsbody:
Listening on all interfaces by default and not mentioning it
at all may leave some people use that default and expose
their certifiers publicly.

This makes it use a safer default and mentions it explicitly.

The ip/port declarations in the sample config were also moved
closer together.
pull_commit_message:
Only listen locally by default

Listening on all interfaces by default and not mentioning it
at all may leave some people use that default and expose
their certifiers publicly.

This makes it use a safer default and mentions it explicitly.

The ip/port declarations in the sample config were also moved
closer together.

pulltitle: Added init script and adapted to the new version string format
pullsbody: I'va added a simpe init script that get's deployed with the rpm, and also I've adapted the version string to the one specified here mozilla/browserid-certifier#6
pull_commit_message:
Made some changes when trying to create a working rpm (install and run):
 - Added a default config, to the rpm and to the config.js file (is no config specified).
 - Now creates the directories for the target rpms
 - Added the node_modules to the rpm, so no extra dependencies are needed
